name: MindSeize
summary: MindSeize is a 2D Metroidvania game set in a Sci-Fi-universe. Transfer your mind to a robot and rescue your beloved one!
info:
• 平台: Nintendo Switch
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: Action, Platformer, 2D
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2020-02-08
  • 售价: $23.99
  • 官方网站: http://mindseizegame.com/
  • 开发: Kamina Dimension
  • 发行: Kamina Dimension
